code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{getTotalEmployees}from'../apis/contractApi';import'./TotalEmployeesDisplay.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TotalEmployeesDisplay=()=>{const[totalEmployees,setTotalEmployees]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{const fetchTotalEmployees=async()=>{try{const total=await getTotalEmployees();setTotalEmployees(total);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching total employees:',error);}};fetchTotalEmployees();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"total-employees-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Total Employees"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:totalEmployees})]});};export default TotalEmployeesDisplay;
